Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or proof provided to show that cows were washed away in floodwaters in Wayanad, Kerala.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the viral video actually shows cows being washed away in floodwaters in Nayarit, Mexico, not Wayanad, Kerala.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by falsely attributing the video to Wayanad, Kerala, when it actually happened in Nayarit, Mexico.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists that the video was mistakenly shared as depicting cows washed away in floodwaters in Wayanad, Kerala, when it actually shows an incident in Nayarit, Mexico.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the video is from Wayanad, Kerala without verifying the source or location.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by not providing accurate information about the location of the incident.
Understate: There is no understatement bias present in the claim.
